price: Nagsabi sila: “Kung sakaling niloob ng Napakamaawain [na si Allāh] ay hindi sana kami sumamba sa kanila.[546]” Walang ukol sa kanila hinggil doon na anumang kaalaman. Walang iba sila kundi nagsasapantaha.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ شَآءَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مَا عَبَدۡنَٰهُمۗ مَّا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُصُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū law shāa al-raḥmānu mā ʿabadnāhum mā lahum bidhālika min ʿil'min in hum illā yakhruṣūna
translations: we would not have worshipped them
we would not have worshipped them
